metadata.title: CVE-2023-36464 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: pypdf is an open source, pure-python PDF library. In affected versions anattacker may craft a PDF which leads to an infinite loop if`__parse_content_stream` is executed. That is, for example, the case if theuser extracted text from such a PDF. This issue was introduced in pullrequest #969 and resolved in pull request #1828. Users are advised toupgrade. Users unable to upgrade may modify the line `while peek not in(b"\r", b"\n")` in `pypdf/generic/_data_structures.py` to `while peek notin (b"\r", b"\n", b"")`.

criterions.comment: pypdf package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
